definition: Octopus card (Hong Kong smart card for electronic payments)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: Please select the BEA Branch from which you would like to collect all your Personalised Octopus cards.
sentences.chinese: 請選擇領取所有個人八達通卡之東亞銀行分行。

sentences.english: With more popular use of credit cards and Octopus cards, do you bring less cash when going out?
sentences.chinese: 八達通及信用卡的普遍會否令你帶少了現金上街？

sentences.english: How frequent do you usually use Octopus Card for paying local travelling expenses?
sentences.chinese: 你大約多久會使用八達通去付車費最少一次？

sentences.english: Which OCL's product do you prefer?
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡下列哪一種的八達通產品？

sentences.english: Which of the following categories of Octopus Card do you use?
sentences.chinese: 你現時使用的是下列哪一種類型的八達通呢？

sentences.english: What method do you often use to add value for your Octopus cards?
sentences.chinese: 請問你多數使用哪種八達通增值方法？

sentences.english: How frequent do you use Octopus Card?
sentences.chinese: 你大約多久日會使用八達通最少一次？

sentences.english: Do you think that the information on OCL's official web site is informative or not?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得登錄在八達通公司網站的資料是否有價值？

sentences.english: What is your type of Octopus cards, namely the ordinary one or the personal one?
sentences.chinese: 請問你的八達通卡是個人還是普通的？

sentences.english: Excuse me, is there any ticket or card like Octopus in Hong Kong?
sentences.chinese: 請問這裏有像香港八達通之類的儲值卡嗎？

sentences.english: Have you ever accessed OCL's official web site?
sentences.chinese: 你有否曾進入八達通公司的網站？

sentences.english: The company has launched its own inquiry on how it handles personal data.
sentences.chinese: 八達通已經就如何處理個人資料發起了自己的調查。

sentences.english: How frequent do you use Octopus Card for making payments in retail shops?
sentences.chinese: 你大約多久會使用八達通去付款購物最少一次？

sentences.english: Have you ever read Octopus Card's personal data policy?
sentences.chinese: 你是否曾經閱讀八達通公司的個人資料聲明？

sentences.english: What do you think when Octopus cards plus credit cards add-valued service?
sentences.chinese: 你對八達通和信用卡二合一有什麼意見？

sentences.english: P: Excuse me, is there any ticket or card like Octopus in Hong Kong?
sentences.chinese: 請問這裏有像香港八達通之類的儲值卡嗎？

definition: (Tw) to put money into (a stored-value card or pre-paid phone account)/to top up
EasyCard, smartcard used for payment on public transport and at other businesses such as convenience stores in Taipei and surrounding areas
to transfer (money to a bank account)
